title: Refunds my Friends
body: Over the past couple of weeks my good friends have been with me in a campaign toward getting Human Ryze for myself through mystery gifts. We only recently found out that we wouldn't of been able to get me the skin this way and while I'm bummed about not being able to get it I feel worse because they've all wasted their money. If possible, I ask on their behalf for a refund of their gifts and the locking of the skins they gave me if at all possible.

replies.body: Unfortunately, refunding gifts is not something that's currently a provided feature.  It was really nice of your friends to get together for this amazing cause; though, it's a bummer finding out that Human Ryze isn't available through it.  If it may help for any future campaigns, we have a [Legacy and Limited](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) skins guide that will provide information on what skins can be found or no longer available.  Best of luck!
